message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting over $8000 in development costs and resources. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly enhance your experience or operations. Considering its worth and the effort put into it, I kindly propose a price of $12000 for this exclusive item. Thank you for considering our offer, and I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product to you.
